review: Google I don't care if you take over the world because this affordable, awesome little product has changed my life.  You need an HDMI port on your TV and a USB to charge it and that is it.  So simple to use - we live in the country near the coast and don't get TV signal and satellite is ridiculously expensive, but we have affordable Wifi and we can stream anything from out computers or phones right to our TV without issue.  YouTube / Netflix / etc.  The only thing that would make it even better is if it worked a little better with Amazon (it streams prime, but not as seamlessly as other websites.
author: bernie

review: Bought in hopes to have great wireless HDMI streaming with netflix and other popular sites; however, even with the Ultimate Verizon wifi speed, this chromecast buffers and lags ever 5 seconds. Useless heap of 35 dollars.

review: i love how easy this is to set up and use.  I have the S4 and it plays my netflix, youtube and pbs for kids directly onto my tv when we turn it on from the phone.  For someone who doesn't watch much tv, this is a great little streaming device.  Even my son who is 3 1/2 knows how to turn it on.
